description: The `synthetic.utm_tracking` table stores information about UTM tracking parameters for digital marketing campaigns, capturing data such as the source (`utm_source`), medium (`utm_medium`), campaign (`utm_campaign`), term (`utm_term`), and content (`utm_content`) associated with various campaigns identified by `campaign_id`. The table plays a key role in tracking the performance of marketing campaigns through generated URLs (`destination_url` and `short_url`) and records metrics such as `clicks`. It serves as a reference for analyzing campaign effectiveness, though it currently has no defined relationships with other tables.

columns.name: tracking_id
columns.description: An incrementing identifier used to uniquely distinguish individual records within the tracking system. Purpose unclear from available data.

columns.name: campaign_id
columns.description: This column represents unique identifiers for different marketing campaigns associated with UTM tracking. Purpose unclear from available data.

columns.name: utm_source
columns.description: This column may capture text data related to various sources or origins of traffic, messages, or actions, as suggested by phrases like "prevent voice," "share site," and "change a." However, the specific purpose is unclear from the available data.

columns.name: utm_medium
columns.description: Purpose unclear from available data. The sample values do not provide a clear indication of what this column specifically represents in business terms.

columns.name: utm_term
columns.description: This column contains text data that appears to represent various phrases or keywords, potentially used to track marketing or campaign terms related to user engagement or content interactions. Purpose unclear from available data.

columns.name: utm_content
columns.description: Purpose unclear from available data. The content appears to be a varied and unstructured set of phrases or statements.

columns.name: destination_url
columns.description: This column likely contains URLs that serve as target web addresses for tracking purposes. These links may be used to redirect users from various marketing or campaign sources to the intended webpage.

columns.name: short_url
columns.description: This column contains shortened versions of URLs that are likely used for tracking purposes in marketing campaigns. These URLs redirect users to specific web pages within different business domains.

columns.name: clicks
columns.description: This column represents the number of times users have clicked on tracked links or advertisements, which is useful for analyzing the effectiveness and engagement of digital marketing campaigns. Purpose unclear from available data.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: This column captures the timestamp for when a UTM tracking entity was recorded or updated. Purpose unclear from available data.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: This column likely records the most recent timestamp when a row in the utm_tracking table was modified. Purpose unclear from available data.

indexes.index_definition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX utm_tracking_pkey ON synthetic.utm_tracking USING btree (tracking_id)
